description.0: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.

0.0: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by <cryo>0.6%</cryo> for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of <cryo>16%</cryo>.

1.0: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by <cryo>0.7%</cryo> for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of <cryo>20%</cryo>.

2.0: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by <cryo>0.8%</cryo> for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of <cryo>24%</cryo>.

3.0: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by <cryo>0.9%</cryo> for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of <cryo>28%</cryo>.

4.0: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by <cryo>1%</cryo> for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of <cryo>32%</cryo>.
